metadata.title: CVE-2015-0557 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Open-source ARJ archiver 3.10.22 does not properly remove leading slashesfrom paths, which allows remote attackers to conduct absolute pathtraversal attacks and write to arbitrary files via multiple leading slashesin a path in an ARJ archive.

criterions.comment: arj: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
